cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to a negative value -1 will cause invalid thread configuration and startup failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the zero correlation zone config to 100 will cause invalid PRACH configuration and RACH procedure failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將零相關區配置設定為 100 會導致無效的 PRACH 配置，並造成 RACH 程序失敗。
